Name: Moravian Cocktail
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of orange slice & cherry on stick (sail).
Review: The hardcore, Czech answer to the Italian Negroni. A drink for those who have acquired a taste for Becherovka.
History: Discovered in 2005 at Be Bop Bar, Prague, Czech Republic.
Nutrition: One serving of Moravian Cocktail contains 180 calories
